#include<stdio.h>
#define M 10000
//Catalan Number:formula=1/n *(2n-2Cn-1)
//But we have to calculate using recursive formula as MOD %10000 which is not a
//prime number
int main()
{
    int t,n,i,j,C[1001]={0};
    C[0]=1;
    for(i=1;i<=1000;i++)
    {
          for(j=0;j<i;j++)
          {
                          C[i]=(C[i]+(C[j]*C[i-j-1])%M)%M;
          }
    } 
    /*for(i=1;i<=100;i++)
    {
                        printf("%d\n",C[i]);
    }  */          
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
              scanf("%d",&n);
              printf("%d\n",C[n-1]);
    }
    return 0;
}
